content: xue hat 1 xue hat needles and notions luuanne chau us 5 3 5 mm 16 circular needles this beanie embellished with wintry colorwork and a us 7 4 5 mm 16 circular needles folded brim of 1x1 ribbing is perfect for holiday gifts set of us 7 4 5 mm dpns 雪 x​ uě - snow in mandarin chinese stitch markers tapestry needle sizes ​1 2 additional notes to fit 21-22 23-24 head circumference with about 1 5-2 5 ● the hat is knit from the bottom up of negative ease shown in size 1 ● hold mc and cc consistently to achieve the best results finished measurements ● the shaping section is written out colorwork is circumference unstretched ​ 19 25 21 5 charted height ​ size 1 - 8 5 with brim folded 9 75 full length ● the hat can be worn with brim folded or without size 2 - 8 75 with brim folded 10 full length pattern help or questions gauge send an email to ​lmvchau@gmail com​ or a dm on ravelry 20 sts and 24 row = 4 in st st on larger needles blocked share your knits on ig and ravelry #xuehat go up or down a needle to maintain this gauge throughout the body of the hat yarn ★ color a ○ 1 1 skein of woolstok worsted by blue sky fibers 100% fine highland wool 123 yds/50 g shown in october sky ○ or 100 110 yds of dk weight yarn ★ color b ○ 1 1 skein of woolstok worsted by blue sky fibers 100% fine highland wool 123 yds/50 g shown in spring ice ○ or 100 110 yds of dk weight yarn © 2020 luuanne chau xue hat 2 techniques 1 x 1 tubular ribbing cast on using waste yarn abbreviations 1 crochet provisional cast on w​ ith a crochet co​ - cast on hook and waste yarn chain a few stitches bobble ​- bind off then chain stitches around the needle move k -​ knit the working yarn behind the needle after p​ - purl adding one stitch repeat until the desired sl ​- slip amount of stitches noted in the pattern k2tog ​- insert needle through 2 stitches knitwise knit 2 below are on the needle chain a few extra together stitches off of needles cut waste yarn and ktbl​ - knit through the back loop pull through st s ​ - stitch es 2 using ​working yarn​ start set up row ssk​✶ - sl 2 sts kwise onto rh needle slip both purlwise 2 1 row 1 *k1 yo repeat from * to last back onto lh needle k2tog tbl through back loop stitch k1 s2kp -​ sl 2 together knitwise k1 then pass the 2 slipped st 2 2 row 2 *sl 1 pwise wyif move yarn to over the knit stitch and off the needles as if to bind off back k1 repeat from * to last st sl 1 sk2p ​-
